content:
‚úÖ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This challenge may be difficult to infer in reverse mode, as the intent is not immediately obvious from the tests alone
Otherwise, the goal is straightforward and the solution is easy to implement
You can't expect everyone to know what a palindrome is, you shoud explain it. That's not an English test. Looks good otherwise

‚ùå Rejected the contribution.
Comment: Similar clashes exist:
- https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/103668efceb074a6eff1718c9e76726fa5c89c
- https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/56158307e8c8de3aa781ddd3a88cf983e46b
Please follow-up on @5DN1L's input. Please be sure to explain what a palindrome is.

‚úÖ Approved the contribution.
Comment: clear and fun :)
Define palindrome for clarification. Also, keeping the letter case consistent for each test would focus attention on the main goal of this coding exercise.

The points below are still outstanding. They ensure better test coverage.

Cases
* Test 4: Please add a palindrome of even length.

* Validator 4: Please add "Radar civic kayak Wood" to the input, so that there are 8 words in total.

Thanks.

Please follow up the points raised by @Ayush-Kukreti. In addition:

Goal
* Please change "sentence" to "string".

Input
* Please change "sentence" to "string".

Constraints
* Please add a constraint on the number of words each input string can contain.

* Please add a constraint on the length of each word (minimum 3).

Stub generator
* Please change 1024 to 100.

* Please add a write statement, e.g. write answer.

Cases
* Test 4: Please add a palindrome of even length and a non-palindrome of even length.

* Validator 4: Please add a non-palindrome of even length.

Thanks.

Your goal is a bit confusing. It can be:
‚ÄúCount how many words in a given sentence are palindromes.‚Äù
Also, there is nothing in the constraints. Please fix this.

Goal
* Please correct the typo: "palyndromes".

Constraints
* Please rewrite as follows:

2 ‚â§ number of words ‚â§ 10
3 ‚â§ length of each word ‚â§ 9
Each word consists of English letters only.

Stub generator
* Please add a write statement, e.g. write answer.

Cases
* Please remove the trailing newlines from the input of the cases below:
  ‚Ä¢ Validator 1
  ‚Ä¢ Validator 2
  ‚Ä¢ Test 3

* Validator 3: Please revise the input to contain non-palindromes only, similar to Test 3.

* Test 4: Please add a palindrome of even length.

* Validator 4: Please add "Radar civic kayak Wood" to the input, so that there are 8 words in total.

Thanks.

This is provided for reference only; I'm not requesting that you withdraw your rejection.

The first clash you linked has only Reverse mode enabled. While the tasks themselves are the same, this contribution differs in that it enables additional modes.

The second clash you linked shares the same theme (palindromes) but involves a different task.

Apologies, I read the second clash wrongly.

As for the first link, I would still err towards rejecting the clash. Will leave the linked clash up for other reviewers to see what they think.

These points are still outstanding:

Cases
* Test 4: Please add a palindrome of even length.

* Validator 4: Please add "Radar civic kayak Wood" to the input, so that there are 8 words in total.

Thanks.
